createData.title: noticed this hover menu has slight transparency to the emojis.
createData.description:
The chat hover emoji menu. This is due to our text color tokens using transparency; theme.text.primary is black w/90% alpha, secondary is 80% alpha, etc.

I recently updated <Text> to accept color="emoji", which assigns a solid colour so emoji look correct. (open to suggestions for a better API, this is admittedly a little weird)

If these emoji aren't inside of a <Text> component, theme.dangerouslyStatic.black should accomplish the same.
